title: Selling Minecraft Account for League of Legends stuff! The minecraft account is a high donator!
body:
Hello. I am selling my minecraft account for league stuff or paypal so I can buy rp. My minecraft account is a high donator on a very popular server. I am taking offers from 50-100. Or more if your nice xD  I never play minecraft anymore and I really want rp. 

If interested pm me or skype me

Skype:  daemyen_forest

replies.body: I'm sure this is not allowed.
Really looking for more then 25-100 for the account since the account its a 450$ donator on servers.

Why would it not be allowed to mutually agree upon an exchange of goods? He can give them the credentials to his minecraft acc, and they can either Buy him RP, send him cash on paypal, or buy him skins. Nothing illegal there. He's not selling his account for RP. He's exchanging goods.

Selling minecraft account for rp isnt allowed?
@Prime Tempest
